revision.text: When Berry plants become ripe, they will die after a set period of time if not harvested. When this happens, only 1/2 of the harvest is obtained. There is also a chance they will replant themselves, spawning a plant of the same berry in that plot. The Replant Rate can be augmented by using the [[Sprinklotad]] Oak Item.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
